mapper.select:
SELECT store.id, store.name, store.address, store.capacity, store.userId, store.createBy, store.createTime, createUser.userName AS createUser, store.updateBy, updateUser.userName AS updateUser, store.updateTime, store.isDel, store.code FROM base_storehouse AS store JOIN sys_user AS createUser ON store.createBy = createUser.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user AS updateUser ON store.updateBy = updateUser.userId
store.isDel = 0
and code like concat('%',#{code},'%')
order by store.createTime desc
mapper.update: update base_storehouse set isDel = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, -- address, -- capacity, -- userId, -- createBy, -- createTime, -- updateBy, -- updateTime, -- isDel, code from base_storehouse where isDel = 0 and name = #{name}
